title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 99 - Deceptive Or Misleading Advertising By Package Store Licensees
content:

§ 99.1 - Declaration
§ 99.2 - Deceptive or misleading advertising
§ 99.3 - Joint advertising
§ 99.4 - Signs on licensed premises
§ 99.5 - Quality and identity of product
§ 99.6 - Price advertising, sales
§ 99.7 - Advertisement defined
§ 99.8 - Use of brand names in advertisements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. B, ch. I, subch. E, pt. 99

Statutory authority: Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, §§ 102[1][b], 107- a, 160

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
